  • public class EsOfferControl
extends ElasticSearchController
    Since:
    21/03/16 This object is used to validate user input when they are trying to associate a bid between two users in the application. Based on Lab07 ElasticSearchController. Original created by esports on 2/17/16. https://github.com/earthiverse/lonelyTwitter
